EmailTemplate.description: Yr 7 info evening response to those who have applied
EmailTemplate.name: Explore Yr 7: app received
EmailTemplate.subject: Explore Year 7: Thank You!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
Thank you for coming along to our Explore Year 7 information evening. We hope you found the event informative and inspiring and enjoyed the demonstrations.
The next step in the application process is for you to visit our campus for an enrolment interview with myself, the Registrar. Year 7 interviews are held two years prior to commencement, when students are in Year 5. To arrange an interview time, please contact our Enrolments team on 9286 9500.
Tell us what you think! We would love your feedback and would appreciate your time in completing this survey:
https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/9V9JGZ7
You can also keep up to date with what’s happening at St Andrew’s via our facebook page. It’s updated daily during term time with news, photos, events and mini videos.
We’re looking forward to welcoming you again to St Andrew’s Cathedral School.
Best regards
Bruce Perry Registrar/Mathematics Teacher
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia direct +61 2 9286 9507 mobile 0418 255 923 email BPerry@sacs.nsw.edu.au phone +61 2 9286 9500 fax +61 29286 9550
